description: This table contains information associated with a billing notification's guarantor record used for EHI export filtering.

columns.name: OUTREACH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the outreach record.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the guarantor account associated with this billing communication record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID associated with the notification. For guarantor notifications, this would be the guarantor's patient record.

columns.name: IS_DELETED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the record has been soft deleted.
